item.description:
In honor of Providence Cocktail Week the Salon is featuring this fun event - and since sampling bourbon and whiskey seems to be a Collective favorite, this might be fun! So let's check it out!

Join Providence Cocktail week on October 21st at The Salon for a night of Bourbon, Bluegrass and BBQ! This unique event will feature a live bluegrass band, a BBQ truck out front, fun bourbon based cocktails as well as straight bourbon at a special cocktail week price. This small batch bourbon will only be in town this week as a treat, so be sure to mosey on down.

BOURBON COCKTAILS:
The Eddy
Jim Beam Black Double Aged Bourbon, Cointreau, Cranberry, Bitters

The Washington
Jim Beam Black Double Aged Bourbon, Southern Comfort, Ginger Beer

The Westminster
Jim Beam Black Double Aged Bourbon, Amaretto, Pineapple, Sweet Vermouth

The Fulton
Jim Beam Black Double Aged Bourbon, Sweet Vermouth, Mint Bitters, Maraschino Cherry

STRAIGHT BOURBON:
-Buffalo Trace (Franklin County, Kentucky)
-Blanton’s (Frankfort, Kentucky)
-1792 Ridgemont Reserve 8 Year (Bardstown, Kentucky)
-Eagle Rare 10 Year (Franklin County, Kentucky)
item.how_to_find_us: I'm not sure I can host this one - anyone interested? Please say so in your RSVP!
item.name: Bourbon, Bluegrass & BBQ at the Salon!
